data.text: @BruceBartlett I don't necessarily disagree with your argument.  And, I am not some Matt Lauer defender. But is is possibly that simply have lots of news about Lauer created a buzz and interest in the Show?  You know, any publicity is good publicity kind of point.
@BruceBartlett We'll see what happens in the long term. There's obviously going to be a bump of "Damn, they dropped him? And what? Let's watch and see what they say about it"
@BruceBartlett Well if any women is being overpaid it is about damn time!
